SEARCH
Package ComparativeGenomics.Drawing

Class QueryShape

java.lang.Object
ComparativeGenomics.Drawing.QueryShape
public class QueryShape extends Object
Draws the query chromosome that has been aligned to the reference chromosome in QueryPanel
Author:
franpeters

    • QueryShape

      public QueryShape(HashMap<Integer,Double> refSitesRelPos, Double xPosFirstMatchedSite, double startY, Double scale, XmapData xmap, CmapData cmap, Double queryStart)
      Constructor with positins, scale, start y, cmap, xmap, start query
      Parameters:
      refSitesRelPos - relative position of reference sites
      xPosFirstMatchedSite - x coordinate of first matched site
      startY - y coordinate
      scale - scale
      xmap - xmap data
      cmap - cmap data
      queryStart - position of the query start
